summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Glass Spray Bottles 16oz Refillable Container suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants (2 Pack，Blue) Review Date: 2021/03/11 Store: RONGCHUANG Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'RONGCHUANG', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.36 Pounds', 'UPC': '768253664713'} Review Text: I got these to replace a bottle of cleaning solution that no longer worked. These bottles are made of glass so they are much sturdier than the typical plastic bottles. The blue glass also looks more "elegant" on a countertop if you plan to display it. There are 2 spray settings (fine mist and stream). I didn't have any issues with leaking. It comes with 2 16 oz bottles, 4 labels, 2 caps, and a funnel (not pictured because I somehow misplaced it already). Review Title: Looks nice on the counter Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: GERSHION Pastel Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Colors Gel Polish Set, Soak Off UV Lamp Gel Polish Kit, Nude Pink Yellow Green Color Nail Polish Kit, 7.5ml Gel Polish Kit H-10 Review Date: 2021/05/23 Store: GERSHION Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GERSHION', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Green,Pastel,Pink,Purple', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.27 x 3.15 inches; 9.74 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a great set of 6 bright, pastel colored gel polishes. Each bottle has a sticker on top to mark the color, which is 100% accurate. The polish is on the thicker side so you only need 1-2 coats for opacity. These will be my go to all summer long! Review Title: Beautiful pastel colors! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MISS SPA Head to Toe Body and Facial Mask Set, Brighten Under-Eye, Deep Therapy Lip Mask, Moisturizing Foot Booties, Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Skin Care for Women, 3-Pack Review Date: 2021/06/11 Store: MISS SPA Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MISS SPA', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,All Skin Types', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.07 x 0.24 x 4.33 inches; 2.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '838623303099'} Review Text: This combo set comes with 3 different “spa” treats: a set of eye patches, feet masks and lip mask. It has a you need to pamper you’re self from head to toe. Here are my 2 cents on each:

Lip mask - it’s big and easily for around my entire mouth. Felt nice and moisturizing on my lips. Leaves you unable to talk for at least 20 min

Feet mask - smells like eucalyptus… nice and cooling on my feet… there are tabs on the side to hold them in place. Feet felt so soft and moisturized after removal. There was no dry spot in sight. I rubbed the rest of the serum all over my legs.

Eye patch - cool and soothing on my face… stays in place even with me moving around freely. Review Title: Nice combo set Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Tirtyl Hand Soap Sheet Variety Pack - 240 Pack with Portable Storage Tin - Camping/Outdoor/Travel/Handbag - Lavender & Aloe - Bergamot & Ylang Ylang - Jasmine & Patchouli Review Date: 2021/07/25 Store: Tirtyl Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Tirtyl', 'Scent': 'Bergamot,Lavender,Jasmine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '240.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 6.26 x 0.75 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: This set contains 3 packs of soap sheets with the following scents/fragrances: Lavender & Aloe, Bergamot & Ylang Ylang, Jasmine & Patchouli. There are 80 sheets in each pack. The sheets are thin and dissolve easily with water. It provides a good amount of lather and smells wonderful. I used the Jasmine & Patchouli scent today and it's pretty long lasting. My hands felt clean, soft, and moisturized afterwards. This set comes with a storage tin so it's perfect for traveling or camping. Review Title: Dissolves easily, smells great, and provides a good lather.... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [ 2 Pack] Eyebrow Pencil -Makeup Brow Stylist Definer Longlasting Waterproof Brow Pencil with Spoolie Brush, Shaper and Filler Auto Pencil For Women - All Hair Colors & Skin Tones (A-Brown) Review Date: 2021/08/12 Store: SZFLWA Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SZFLWA', 'Item Form': 'Gel,Pencil', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '4.72 x 0.79 x 0.2 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '765835047612'} Review Text: This is a pack of 2 mechanical brow liners in the color brown. These are dual ended pencils so one end has a brow brush while the other end has the eyebrow product. The pencils have a beautiful gold casing that is slim and comfortable to grasp. I think the formula is a little dry so I had to apply some pressure for the desired color payout. The fine tip allows you to draw in precise brow hairs. The staying power is great and held up well throughout my 8+ hour work day. I wanted to test out the waterproof claim so I did shower without washing my face and the color didn't really budge if left untouched. It came off easily using a makeup wipe. Review Title: Requires some effort for application but stays on pretty well..... Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: UNNY CLUB Cover Glow Cushion 0.3 Oz / 11g Beige Color SPF50+, Flawless Gloss Cushion Powder Complex Single Layer Concealer Cover Moisture Essence Tight Fit, Korea Cosmetics (No.23 Natural Beige) Review Date: 2021/09/30 Store: UNNY CLUB Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 3.03 x 1.06 inches; 0.39 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a concealer in a cushion powder form. It comes in a compact with a magnetic closure and included sponge. It only comes in 2 colors: light beige and natural beige. I got the natural beige which is still on the lighter side and is best for fair to light complexions. This provides good coverage and blends easily. It applies like a liquid but dries like a powder. Review Title: Natural beige is still pretty light Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyebrow Brow Stamp Stencil Kit, Eyebrow Stamping Kit with 6 Pairs Reusable Eyebrow Stencils, Long Lasting Waterproof One Step Brow Stamp Kit(Black) Review Date: 2021/10/01 Store: QrBxa Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'QrBxa', 'Item Form': 'Eyebrow Pencil,Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable, Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 4.49 x 2.44 inches; 2.54 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'QEC-Dark Grey', 'UPC': '735913856573'} Review Text: This eyebrow kit includes an air cushion eyebrow stamp, 24 sticker stencils, and 4 eyebrow brushes. The stencils come in a variety of different shapes and are really easy to use, unfortunately you can only use them one time. The stamp provided a fairly natural color and washed off with just water so I'm kind of skeptical about the smudgeproof/waterproof claim. This is great if you have to do your makeup in a hurry. It would have been better if the stencils were reusable. Review Title: Stencils are one time use only... Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Shopping Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Home and Cleaning:** Strong inclination towards eco-friendly and aesthetic household items such as refillable glass spray bottles.
  
- **Beauty and Self-Care:** Frequent purchases of beauty products, particularly gel nail polishes in vibrant colors, facial masks, and eyebrow makeup essentials, signaling an interest in personal grooming and self-care routines.

- **Trendy and Functional:** Preference for products that offer both functionality and style, as seen in the selection of pastel nail polishes and elegant glass containers.

- **Travel-Friendly Items:** Purchases such as portable soap sheets highlight a desire for convenience and practicality in on-the-go products.

- **Natural and Non-Toxic Options:** Notable choices of non-toxic beauty products, showcasing a commitment to safer, healthier options.

- **Variety and Multi-Purpose Use:** Enthusiasm for sets or kits that combine multiple products (e.g., makeup sets, skincare treatments), suggesting a preference for value and comprehensive solutions.

- **Scent Preferences:** Atypical appreciation for fragrant items (e.g., scented soap sheets), indicating a sensory-oriented shopping behavior.

- **Attention to Product Reviews:** Engages with products that have solid average ratings, reflecting a cautious approach to purchasing, based on quality and user satisfaction.

Overall, this individual demonstrates a blend of practicality, aesthetic sensibility, and a holistic approach to wellness and beauty.

target_interaction.title: Glides on smoothly and does a decent job on my skin.
target_interaction.text: I have really oily skin, especially in my T-zone region. I normally rely on blotting paper but sometimes, I feel like it smudges my makeup or requires me to go through a couple of sheets before it gets the job done. I decided to give this product a try. I have seen an ad for something like this before from Revlon and have been meaning to get my hands on it. This set comes with 2 volcanic balls, a holder, drying mat and drawstring bag. The volcanic ball did a decent job of removing excess oil without ruining my makeup. It took a couple of tries in some areas versus others. I felt a slight cooling effect while using this. This glides smoothly on to the skin. It is very compact so you can take it wherever you go and it can be washed and reused.
target_interaction.title_meta: Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller,Jade Roller Set Facial Beauty Tools,Face Roller Skin Massager for Face
features: Jade Roller: The jade roller can improve skin circulation, soothes your skin, reducing puffiness, wrinkling and fine lines to smooth your skin. It can also help you regain the smooth and the youthful skin you’ve lost to time.

Oil-absorbing Facial Roller: Real volcanic stone brings incredibly efficiency for blotting oily skin. Use it on a clean or finished face—it won’t mess up your makeup. It has super fine pores has an excellent absorption power. Relax facial muscles, that are suitable for all skin types.
Easy to Use: Built-in special ball design, rolling is silkier and easier, gently or wherever the skin is shiny, rolling the face rollers. The oil on the face will disappear.

Easy To Clean: To clean, twist the roller’s ring to unlock, and pull out the stone or jade. Wash with a gentle cleanser, then put it on a special mat to dry before locking it back in or put it in a spare box. This oil-absorbing facial roller can be used repeatedly, which is more environmentally friendly and does not waste.
Packing Include: Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller*1; Jade roller*1. Light weight and mini size make it easy to carry, you don’t have to go rooting around your purse for blotting papers anymore.
description: Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller& Jade Roller

Cuckoo has one pc of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller and one pc of Jade roller.  The oil-absorbing volcanic face roller can help you absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times.  The jade roller can improve skin circulation, soothes your skin, reducing puffiness, wrinkling and fine lines to smooth your skin.
Advantage Of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller
Like oil-absorbing paper, but better. Roll through your face with volcanic stone balls to instantly absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times.
Unlike blotting papers for oily skin that are used once and thrown out, this oil-absorbing roller is easy to clean make it reusable.
Built-in special ball design, rolling is silkier and easier, gently or wherever the skin is shiny, rolling the face rollers. The oil on the face will disappear.
You don’t have to go rooting around your purse for blotting papers anymore.
Natural approach to caring the skin, no dyes, sulfates, parabens or other chemicals. It is made of 100% natural Brazilian rose quartz jade stone.
Use superb sanding technology to polish the surface of the jade many times. It is super fine and smooth so that don't scratch your skin.
Lifts and tighten skin& Improve the blood circulation& Smooth and reduce wrinkles& Reduces dark circles and puffiness

videos.title: Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller
